short_description.en: $200 rebate for DIY attic insulation and air sealing, must meet R42 insulation level.
Instant discounts starting at $300 for ENERGY STAR® certified electric heat pump water heaters.
Up to $500 rebate for residential solar PV systems, additional $500 for rural areas.
$50 rebate for qualified smart thermostats. Available as instant discounts in the online marketplace or as rebates.
$1,000 rebate for air source heat pumps replacing natural gas or electric resistance.
$400 rebate for air source heat pumps replacing propane, oil, existing heat pump, etc.
$750 rebate for certified geothermal heat pumps without natural gas service or $1000 with natural gas service.
Up to $675 rebate for ENERGY STAR® Qualified Air Sealing, assessment required.
Up to $1,125 rebate for ENERGY STAR® Qualified Air Sealing, assessment required. For income-qualified customers.
Up to $525 rebate for attic insulation.
Up to $675 rebate for attic insulation. For income-qualified customers.
Up to $150 rebate for foundation insulation.
Up to $225 rebate for foundation insulation. For income-qualified customers.
Up to $450 rebate for wall insulation.
Up to $75 rebate for duct sealing & insulation.
Free smart EV charger ($1,100 value) for members who purchase an EV and meet requirements.
$400 rebate for alternative EV chargers compatible with load management equipment.
20% rebate for geothermal heat pumps, up to $500/ton.
20% rebate for residential electric water heaters, up to $150 for 75-99 gallons and up to $300 for 100+ gallons. Must be load managed.
20% rebate for heat pump water heaters with EF 2.00+, up to $300.
20% rebate for air source & mini-split heat pumps, up to $300/ton. SEER2 14.3+, HSPF2 7.5+.
$25 rebate for ENERGY STAR® induction ranges.
$25 rebate for ENERGY STAR® clothes dryers.
20% of cost for energy efficiency improvements, up to $500.
Up to $400 incentive for EV chargers.
Up to $800 incentive for smart EV chargers with integrated metering.
$500/ton for geothermal heat pumps.
$50 for ENERGY STAR® clothes dryers.
$150 rebate for 75-99 gallon residential high efficiency water heaters or $300 for 100+ gallons. UEF must be at least .88.
$300 rebate for heat pump water heaters, UEF .88, on load control.
$300/ton for SEER2 14.3+, HSPF2 7.5+ or SEER 15+, HSPF 8.8+ air source & mini-split heat pumps.
$50 for induction ranges.
$25 incentive for Honeywell or Emerson brand smart thermostats enrolled in Load Management Program.
Up to $500 for audit-recommended energy efficiency improvements.
$400 incentive towards the purchase of any EV charger.
Up to $800/ton rebate for geothermal heat pumps.
$25 rebate for ENERGY STAR® clothes dryers.
Up to $461/unit rebate for high efficiency water heaters. UEF must be .88 or greater, must be controlled by load control program.
Up to $300/unit rebate for heat pump water heaters. UEF must be 2.00 or greater.
Up to $300/ton rebate for air source & mini-split heat pumps. SEER2 14.3+, HSPF2 7.5+ or SEER 15+, HSPF 8.8+.
$25 incentive for induction ranges.
$25 incentive for Honeywell or Emerson brand smart thermostats enrolled in Load Management Program.
Up to $500 for audit-recommended energy efficiency improvements.
$25 rebate for ENERGY STAR® clothes dryers.
Up to $500 rebate for an electric water heaters, depending on efficiency and capacity. Must be on load control.
$400 rebate for heat pump water heaters, UEF .88, on load control.
$25 rebate for induction ranges.
Up to $400/ton rebate for air source & mini-split heat pumps. SEER2 14.3+, HSPF2 7.5+ or SEER 15+, HSPF 8.8+.
Up to $850/ton rebate for geothermal heat pumps.
$25 incentive for Honeywell or Emerson brand smart thermostats enrolled in Load Management Program.
Up to $500 for audit-recommended energy efficiency improvements.
$25 rebate for ENERGY STAR® rated clothes dryers.
$25 rebate for ENERGY STAR® rated induction ranges.
$400 incentive for new EV chargers.
$800 incentive for smart EV chargers with integrated metering.
$500/ton rebate for geothermal heat pumps.
$50 rebate for heat pump clothes dryers.
Up to $300 rebate for residential high efficiency water heaters. UEF of at least .88. Must be on load control.
Up to $300 rebate for heat pump water heaters. Must have UEF of at least 2.20.
$300/ton rebate for air source heat pumps/mini-splits. Must be 14.3+ SEER2 , HSPF2 7.5+ or SEER 15+, HSPF 8.8+.
$500/ton rebate for geothermal heat pumps. AHRI Certificate must be provided.
$25 rebate for Emerson or Honeywell smart thermostats.
$500 rebate for metered level 2 EV chargers.
$400/ton rebate for ENERGY STAR® rated ground source heat pumps.
$500 rebate for ENERGY STAR® rated heat pump water heaters.
Up to $1,000 rebate for air source heat pumps, must meet SEER2 and HSPF2.
$25 rebate for ENERGY STAR® rated electric clothes dryers.
$400 rebate for pool air source heat pumps, must be tested to AHRI 1160.
$25 rebate for Wi-Fi smart thermostats.
$150 rebate for ENERGY STAR® rated clothes dryers.
$150 rebate for ENERGY STAR® rated induction ranges.
$800 rebate for smart EV chargers with integrated metering.
$500/ton rebate for air source heat pumps SEER 14+, HSPF 8.2+, or EER 11+.
$500/ton rebate for geothermal heat pumps. New units not allowed on load management program.
Up to $500 rebate for energy efficiency improvements. Must be recommendations from an audit arranged by a cooperative approved partner.
Up to $300 rebate for water heaters with capacity of at least 75 gallons.
$300 rebate for integrated heat pump water heaters. UEF 2.00 or greater.
Up to $400 incentive for EV chargers.
Up to $800 incentive for smart EV chargers with integrated metering.
$500/ton rebate for geothermal heat pumps.
$25 rebate for ENERGY STAR® clothes dryers.
Up to $600 incentive for residential high efficiency water heaters, depending on capacity. UEF must be at least .88.
$600 incentive for integrated heat pump water heaters. UEF must be at least 2.20.
$300/ton rebate for central ducted air source heat pumps. SEER2 14.3+, HSPF2 7.5+ OR SEER 15+, HSPF 8.8+.
$300/ton rebate for ductless mini-split heat pumps. SEER2 14.3+, HSPF2 7.5+ OR SEER 15+, HSPF 8.8+.

$25 for smart thermostats enrolled in Load Management Program.
Up to $500 for audit-recommended energy efficiency improvements.
$800 rebate for smart EV chargers with integrated metering.
$500/ton rebate for geothermal heat pumps, may qualify for off-peak rates.

$300/ton rebate for air source & mini-split heat pumps, SEER2 14.3+, HSPF2 7.5+.
$25 rebate for induction ranges.
$200/kW solar PV rebate, capped at $600 per account.
30% of cost for air infiltration reduction measures, up to $1,000.
Up to $600/ton for geothermal heat pumps.
$50 rebate for ENERGY STAR® clothes dryers.
Up to $1,000 rebate for water heaters, depending on capacity and efficiency. Must be load controlled.
$300 rebate for integrated heat pump water heaters. UEF must be at least 2.2.
Up to $400/ton for air source & mini-split heat pumps with SEER2 14.3+ or SEER 15+.
$50 rebate for induction ranges.
$500 incentive for qualified Solar Electric (PV) System installations.
$75 incentive for WiFi enabled smart thermostats.
Up to $500 for audit-recommended energy efficiency improvements.
$400 rebate for EV chargers with load control.
$800 rebate for smart EV chargers with integrated metering and load control.
$500/ton rebate for geothermal heat pumps.
$25 rebate for ENERGY STAR® clothes dryers.
Up to $300 rebate for residential high efficiency water heaters, depending on capacity. UEF must be at least .88.
